dcterms:creator: L. Panait
S. Luke
R. P. Wiegand
dcterms:description: A simple single state continuous game for 2 agents, one action dimension per agent. Each agent has a bounded action space. The reward for a joint action is given by the equation f1 = h1 * a1 * a2 * x1 + f2 = h2 * a1 * a2 * y1 + c2 * s1 * s2 * r(a1, a2) = max(f1, f2)
dcterms:title: Max of Two Quadratics game
